user.title: Droplet
user.description: Set up your Droplet water meter.

confirm.title: Droplet
confirm.description: Droplet device found at {host}. Enter the pairing code to connect.

options.title: Droplet options
options.description: Configure water tariff and leak detection sensitivity.

data_description.water_tariff: Cost per unit volume of water (per m³ or per gallon). If set to 0, cost sensors will report zero.
data_description.water_leak_threshold: Minimum flow rate (L/min) below which continuous flow is not considered a leak. E.g. 0 = any continuous flow over 24h triggers a leak alert, 0.05 = ignore flows below 0.05 L/min.

reconfigure.title: Reconfigure Droplet
reconfigure.description: Update the connection settings for your Droplet device.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the Droplet device. Check the IP address and pairing code.

abort.unique_id_mismatch: The device ID does not match the existing configuration.
